Html:
As per documentation (http://netoffice.codeplex.com/documentation)
I see ExcelApi.dll has following dependencies...
  • OfficeApi.dll
  • VBIDEApi.dll
  • NetOffice.dll
I am planning to use NetOffice Release 1.0 Framework 3.5.


But In following location I do not find NetOffice.dll ? Am I missing anything or documentation is old ? I want to make sure that I include all the dependent .dll.

C:\Users\XXXX\Downloads\NetOffice Release 1.0\NetOffice Release 1.0\Net3.5\Assemblies\Any CPU

Thanks
Ocean
NetOffice.dll has formerly another name AFAIK so u can maybe look more precisely for it ;)

Hello,

Why are you planning to use NetOffice Release 1.0 if we are in the 1.5.1.2 ?

Download the newest version of NetOffice.

In older version, NetOffice.dll used to be LateBindingApi.dll

https://github.com/Excel-DNA/Add-In-Manager/blob/master/NetOffice%201.5.1.2%20%5BRC%5D/ChangeLog.txt

To find latest version, try following link.

https://netoffice.codeplex.com/downloads/get/454192
